name: Ladder Clicker - Reroll Evergrind (Demo)
description:
We have polished the very idea of this game from 2009, made some browser and mobile versions, finally it is playable on PC.

Attention! This is a demo, without story and questlines, full game with different worlds and global events would be released in late 2023.

Main features:

  • Level up - fighting endless monsters with different stats, abilities and rarity
  • Gear - getting loot from monsters, resource zones or events
  • Craft - improve your gear or even merge it to have up to 12 magic properties
  • Die - eventually from unlucky critical hit, or willingly sacrifice character for overall progression

Feel free to connect us with fatalerrormobile@gmail.com
